caption: An upbeat synthwave track with retro analog synthesizers, pulsing arpeggios, and vocoder-processed vocals. The production features gated reverb drums, neon-soaked pads, and a driving bassline that evokes 80s nostalgia.
lyrics:
[Intro]

[Verse 1]
Neon lights flash through the rain
Driving fast down memory lane
The city sleeps but we're alive
Chasing dreams at midnight drive

[Pre-Chorus]
Turn the radio up high
Watch the stars go flying by

[Chorus]
Running through the night
Chasing electric lights
We're living in a dream
Nothing's what it seems
Running through the night

[Verse 2]
Retro future in my mind
Leaving yesterday behind
Synthesizers fill the air
Take me anywhere

[Chorus]
Running through the night
Chasing electric lights
We're living in a dream
Nothing's what it seems
Running through the night

[Synth Solo]

[Bridge]
We are the children of the night
Bathed in artificial light

[Outro Chorus]
Running through the night
Chasing electric lights
Running through the night
